questions.question: If you wanted all features from a dataset to come out of the FeatureReader in one stream, regardless of feature type, which Output Ports option would you choose?
If you had multiple features with an attribute containing a file path to a dataset, which FeatureReader parameter would you use to control which datasets were read?

The image above (under the Challenge heading) shows point locations of community centers and polygons of service areas. What will occur if a FeatureReader is configured to read centers with a spatial filter of Intersect using the areas as the initiators?
options: All community centers will be read multiple times.
Some community centers will be read multiple times.
No community centers will be read multiple times.
No community centers will be read.

questions.question: A FeatureWriter only ever contains one output port.
Which attribute can be used to locate written data downstream of a FeatureWriter?
